name: run
description:
Run a Convex function (query, mutation, or action) on your deployment.

Returns the result and any log lines generated by the function.

deploymentSelector.description: Deployment selector (from the status tool) to run the function on.

functionName.description: The name of the function to run (e.g. 'path/to/my/module.js:myFunction').

args.description: The argument object to pass to the function, JSON-encoded as a string.
